title: BRAILLE
output_placeholder: Type above to generate dotted patterns...
guide:
### 6-Dot Matrix
Logic pattern by decades.

#### Decade 1 (a-j): Top Dots
| Char | Dots | Pattern |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **a** | 1 | ⠁ |
| **b** | 1-2 | ⠃ |
| **c** | 1-4 | ⠉ |

#### Decade Rules
1. **a-j:** Base.
2. **k-t:** Base + Dot 3 (Bot Left).
3. **u-z:** Base + Dots 3 & 6 (Bot Row).
